response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase this item for $1,200,000. This exceptional piece represents a significant investment and could potentially be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or have any questions about the product. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1200000}
